title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1516/1999 of 12 July 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1443/98 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in the rice products sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1516/1999
of 12 July 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 1443/98 establishing the supply balance for the Canary Islands in the rice products sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1443/98 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
